title: The Palmer Raids of 1919 were conducted against

content.question: The Palmer Raids of 1919 were conducted against

choices.label: Republicans bitterly opposed to the Wilson administration
alleged financial backers of Marcus Garvey
labor organizers for the American Federation of Labor
White racist organizations such as the Ku Klux Klan

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
